WEBSITES



A website about the work of a fisherman in the Bering Sea. Probably the best free internet guide on how to get a job on a fishing boat in the Bering Sea. I've created and completed this project completely on my own. It is also my first website.

WordPress HTML & CSS Xara Designer Pro X10 Sony Vegas Pro 11.0 Ableton Live 9 Google Analytics & Webmasters cPanel befunky.com photo editor CloudFlare Drift HD camcoder

Working on this project taught me all I know about creating a responsive website purely by code. It is also a showcase of my work. Credit for teaching me goes to the best teacher ever - mr. Travis Neilson. My thanks also goes to DevTips community on Github.

Jekyll Linux HTML & CSS Liquid Sass Bourbon jQuery Xara Designer Pro X10 befunky.com photo editor Brackets Code Editor

An interactive resume I created to get your attention - my work, my experience, my life, one page - in Czech and in English, with links to my previous employers and my projects. References and all my certificates are available for download on this website.
